instructions: place the dinner fork on the left side
place the dinner knife on the opposite right side, leaving space in the middle
put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork
place the salad life to the right of the dinner knfie
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife
place the desert table in the center, above all of the silverware, with the curved end facing the le
move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon
move the dessert spoon to the top and place it between the forks and knives. it should be horizontal
place the dinner plate in the center between the silverware
put the bread plate to the top left diagonal of the dinner plate
place the butter knife diagonally across the top of the bread plate
place the wine glass above the soup spoon
place the water glass to the right of the dessert spoon
place the napkin in the center of the dinner plate
